metadata.Title: CVE-2017-2480 on Ubuntu 23.10 (mantic) - medium
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 10.3 isaffected. Safari before 10.1 is affected. iCloud before 6.2 on Windows isaffected. iTunes before 12.6 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 10.2 isaffected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remoteattackers to bypass the Same Origin Policy and obtain sensitive informationvia a crafted web site.

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in mantic is affected and may need fixing.
